title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    No alerts at this time                Updated July 6, 2016   ROADS South Rim, North Rim, and East Portal Roads are OPEN.   CAMPGROUNDS   South Rim: OPEN, and water is available. North Rim: OPEN, and water is available. East Portal: OPEN, but water is NOT available.  More information »   GUNNISON RIVER WATER FLOWS Information from the USGS about water flows through Black Canyon.   ANNUAL CLIMBING ROUTE CLOSURE Serpent Point and adjacent routes are closed through July 15, 2016 for the protection of nesting raptors. More information »
